cip.CSE581.assign2

Class Assignment2b

  • java.lang.Object
    • cip.CSE581.assign2.Assignment2a
      • cip.CSE581.assign2.Assignment2b
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRenderScene

    public class Assignment2b
extends Assignment2a
    This takes the simple ray renderer from Assignment2a and adds ambient and diffuse shading. You may want to difference it with Assignment2a to see what was added.

    Usage: 

         RenderWindow -r cip.CSE581.assign2.Assignment2b

    Since:
    fall 2002

    • Method Detail

      • getTitle

        public java.lang.String getTitle()
        Description copied from interface: IRenderScene
        Get the title that should be used for the displayed rendering window. This method will be called after the IRenderScene.loadScene(String) method is called. This allows the title to be part of the loaded scene description.
        Specified by:
        getTitle in interface IRenderScene
        Overrides:
        getTitle in class Assignment2a
        Returns:
        (nullable) The title for the displayed rendering window.

      • getPixelColor

        java.awt.Color getPixelColor(Line3f ray)
        Get the colour for a pixel (really, get the color for a view ray).
        Overrides:
        getPixelColor in class Assignment2a
        Parameters:
        ray - The ray we want the colour for.
        Returns:
        Returns the colour seen by this ray.
